Posts.Content: Nov 25, 2013 10:00AM Martessa2553 wrote: My surgery was on 9/23/13 and yes, I had the same sensations. It was horrible the first time I felt room temperature water going down. It felt as if the water/liquids were spreading at the site of mastectomy. Eventually, with time symptoms cleared.
Posts.Title: Hot or Cold drinks and food, feel in chest on masectomy side vaper LindaKR

Posts.Content: Dec 3, 2013 03:02PM Martessa2553 wrote: I am stage 1 grade 1 I did a radical mastectomy, no chemo and no radiation My MO did ordered an ONCOTYPE DX test to find out what my chances were for cancer coming back because I was refusing Chemo. Received results to only 5 percent chance in a period of 5 years. My MO put me on arimidex 1 mg and started meds on 12/01/13. I am not happy taking the arimidex because of the side effects but I chose this over chemo. I am blessed that this cancer was caught on time. But the experience has not been a pleasant one. Still I am blessed because no Chemo
Posts.Title: stage 1A breast cancer msmaples516 Martessa2553

Posts.Content: Dec 18, 2013 04:39AM Martessa2553 wrote: I was stage 1 grade 1 with no lymph nodes involved.  Onco wanted me to do chemo and kept saying no.  She then ordered the Oncotype DX test which came back at 5 percent in 5 years.  Onco said I did not need chemo but would need to do hormone therapy (anastrozole 1mg) for 5 years to which I agreed.
Posts.Title: oncotype:16, (hormone driven w/one 3mm lymph node mmvh Martessa2553
